left alone, parms->pool was the right pool to allocate
from, since the created ap_directive_t has to live after

author: rich
msg: First cut at annotation/tag support for double-submit prevention.  Currently, the feature is simply this:

If you use netui:form, netui:button (with an 'action'), netui:anchor, or netui:imageAnchor in conjunction with a 'preventDoubleSubmit=true' action, you will get a DoubleSubmitException if you click two or more times on the same link/button.
